TopicTitle: Who's exploiting the contract bug for space stations now?

Articles.Content:
http://www.planetary.org/blogs/jason-davis/2015/20250226-russia-iss-2024.html

Ha ha, the Russians are going to detach their units in 2024, to get those sweet kerbucks contract money!
While amusing, since this has more to do with real-life space exploration than KSP as such, it really belongs in the Space Lounge. Moving
